tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_policies (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    policy_description TEXT,
    is_active BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE policy_documents (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  content TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP,
  owner_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_records (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  document_id UUID,
  record_type VARCHAR(50),
  record_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20),
  FOREIGN KEY (document_id) REFERENCES policy_documents(id)
);

CREATE TABLE SecurityPolicies (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_name VARCHAR(255),
    policy_description TEXT,
    policy_owner VARCHAR(100),
    creation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ComplianceDocumentation (
    doc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    doc_name VARCHAR(255),
    doc_type VARCHAR(100),
    doc_content TEXT,
    upload_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE RemoteWorkOperations (
    operation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    operation_name VARCHAR(255),
    department VARCHAR(100),
    operation_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE security_policies (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_name VARCHAR(255),
    policy_description TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_documentation (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(255),
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    document_content TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE remote_workers (
    worker_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    worker_name VARCHAR(255),
    department VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE access_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    worker_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    accessed_at TIMESTAMP
)
